column4: Kartahis if you mean testing it is ppa:mozillateam/firefox-next but the latest stable firefoxes get updated automatically
W: Failed to fetch http://ppa.launchpad.net/mozillateam/firefox-stable/ubuntu/dists/precise/main/binary-i386/Packages  404  Not Found <--- is this normal? do I replace stable with next?
no it is not normal is this a fresh install? go to software centre and go to Edit > Software Sources then remove that statble ppa and then run sudo apt-add-repository ppa:mozillateam/firefox-next
W: GPG error: http://ppa.launchpad.net precise Release: The following signatures couldn't be verified because the public key is not available: NO_PUBKEY 9BDB3D89CE49EC21
where do you get this error - wile adding the beta repository?
that seems odd how about remove all firefox repositories nd leave yourself with the default ubuntu repositories since they update firefox anyway...
it seems ff 15 is out and it's not the repos
it is in mine... is this a frehs install?
im not sure im just giving you suggestions
I appreciate all the effort though
sorry i couldnt be of much help
...and I've just remembered I do ff updates through ff
on my box they are just regularly updated through the update manager
